title: TRA 2008 Keynote Address
segmentation: Dear Mr connectional ministers.
Parliamentarian representatives, ladies and gentlemen.
It's a pleasure for me to say in warm welcome here to the TRA 2008 in Louisiana.
On behalf of Airtrack, I wish us a good networking within the next days and knugen and fruitful outcome for our sustainable mobility.
We are.
Aiming for.
Just remind what is a real mission of TTRA here.
Chair ASP in organizing Co.
Organized by the air track.
Though the mission of Air Track is the mission of the TR A we want to create systems approach, we want to create and fruitful discussion and networking to solve our huge problems.
We are looking for in our mobility system.
So we are based on strategic.
Research again the web.
You're covering everything.
It is necessary to bring us ahead in the development of sustainable mobility.
We have come a long way since air truck has been started a few years ago.
You have created tuition where we should go, identified challenges made out, several options for solutions and cream.
Better to plan our SRA and are now in the implementation phase in finding your research projects and technical solutions for the whole thing or problems.
Ladies and gentlemen, Rd transport is 1.
Of the most complex and multi stakeholder systems we have in our industry.
On the one hand, we are really proud to be responsible for 20% of our grass development product.

We are contribute to 9% of our total workforce here in Europe and 30% of our aunties spend it here in the transport system, not only in the auto industry but also in the road industry and every stakeholder which is belonging to our mobility system.
But on the other hand, depending on the service you are taking, we are required we had.
Responsible for about 40,000 deaths per year and 20% of our CO2 emission.

So we have to address all those challenges, not only one of it we have will press all them and to find an holik system which is solving source problem and the TRA is the main four out to discuss solutions and requirements out of those changes.
We are looking for a total systems abraj.
It's not only to look on one face or one stakeholder.
To solve this problem, we have to consider the whole system from.
Primary energy from the energy production responsibility of the energy carrier, Anta.
Related powertrains up to these recycling of our cars.
The whole system has to be taken into account then this needs really a multi stakeholder approach.
And air track really, in my opinion is C. Most multistakeholder approach in the European Union, our partners are coming from each sector, being responsible for urban transport.
It's not only the bigger manufacturers.
It's the automotive suppliers, but also the academia is well represented.
Although EU national representatives EU bodies, and although the regions in the cities and this is very important, then finally we have to stabilize our systems.
We have to introduce our technology in the region and we have to bring the systems together to run one European system.
Currently we are looking for.
Several different national approaches, but we have to link them together to an European approach.
An air track is an huge platform.
Real iving sis.
So we have to bring together this fully heterogeneous sector with so different stakeholders to bring them together to one wish and what should be our sustainable mobility in the future.
So we have a broad spectrum in airtrack available to discuss this on.
To be the right body to be the base of such a discussion.
And we have all the National Nations representatives with us.
So we are really committed to a fast and quick introduction into the national strategies.
What we have developed within hours platform.
Our research framework topics are Riley Pizza base for this TRA you find our four main topics here in the structure of this conference.
Mobility, transport and infrastructure, as well as safety and security, energy, environment and resources, and design and production system.
Everything your find here.
So we created the basis for the discussion and networking.
The next days here.
Now we are supplementing everything we collected together from the different, different stakeholders.

To priorize and too concentrated on for more or less areas where we would like to show dramatical improvement in the future first on urban mobility, this is really the most complex system within our mobility sector.
Energy and environment will be traumatically dramatically influenced our mobility, at least within the next five years.
Long distance transport isn't huge reason of discussion.
We have to increase dramatically the infant.
Efficiency of long distance transport and safety and security.
As already mentioned by Commissioner Patashnik is in huge issue to be solved.

So we're concentrating it and we are what we are doing now is making scenarios on how those points will evolve in the future and we will carry out what kind of scenario we want to have and make identify the hurdles which avoid that.
Such an system will come and make it happen.
So by identify, identifying, and solving social.

Ladies and gentlemen, you chop here now is really in the idea of air track and tiare to make networking discuss your topics, you issues your opinions, your ideas you have, brings them all together and self off.
Let's fill the tree.
We have seen just ahead of my presentation.
Let's fill the tree with your all ideas.
So takes the opportunity to meet with all the export experts of the different stakeholders here.
To meet with the automotive sector, the pavement with ITSI and preaches peace fuels and transport planners.
They are all here and meet with the European.
Bodies.
I will believe strongly is.
That I would challenge once we have currently in our Rd sector are really is the hardest one we have ever seen.
What is coming up, especially on the energy and environment sector has never been so hard as today, but.
Our vision is, and we absolutely believe that technology can solve our problems.
We can do this.
We just what we have to do is to concentrate our research on source projects on a common vision and come out.
We say properly and fast solution for our problems.
Thank you ladies and gentlemen for your attention.
Videos.
Thank you.
